nodes.text: Junipera was an alcoholic beverage that was potable by humans. At some point by 5 ABY, junipera was served to New Republic pilot Norra Wexley on the planet Chandrila, in a bar which overlooked the Silver Sea. She became inebriated after drinking it, and her cheeks became flushed.
Junipera first appeared in Aftermath: Empire's End, a 2017 canon novel written by Chuck Wendig.
